abstract: An error that indicates the layer doesn’t support the current texture usage for tracking areas textures.

## Discussion

Compare the value the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_layer_renderer_configuration_get_tracking_areas_usage] function returns and make sure it has at least `MTLTextureUsageShaderRead` and does not contain `MTLTextureUsageShaderAtomic`

# LayerRendererConfigurationError.unsupportedTrackingAreasUsage

**Case**

An error that indicates the layer doesn’t support the current texture usage for tracking areas textures.

## Declaration

```swift
case unsupportedTrackingAreasUsage
```

## Discussion

Compare the value the [doc://com.apple.compositorservices/documentation/CompositorServices/cp_layer_renderer_configuration_get_tracking_areas_usage] function returns and make sure it has at least `MTLTextureUsageShaderRead` and does not contain `MTLTextureUsageShaderAtomic`
title: LayerRendererConfigurationError.unsupportedTrackingAreasUsage
